question: The international exhibition 'World Dental Show 2017' has opened in which city?
explanation: The 3-day international exhibition - \'World Dental Show 2017\' has opened in Mumbai, MaharashtraÂ  on October 6, 2017 to showcase the evolving global technologies and techniques in dentistry. The show will facilitate the exhibitors from across the globe to meet the \'who is who\' in the Indian dental arena and provide them to use this platform to build networks of influence, launch new products and create awareness about new clinical claims. The exhibition, hosted by the Indian Dental Association (IDA), has witnessed participation from the international exhibitors from China, Germany, Israel, Malaysia, Russian Federation, South Korea, Taiwan, Turkey, UK and US.
